name: Easy Calculation Forms
author: RedNao

sections.description:
Want to see demos of the type of forms that can be created? Go here
For more details Check the documentation

Order Forms, Quotes, Even Registration and more. If you need to calculate a price in your form this is the best builder for you.

Features

  • A bunch of fields at your disposal
    • Text Box: Add one line of text (Demo)
    • Numeric Box: Add a number (Demo)
    • Multiple Box: Add multiple lines of text (Demo)
    • Dropdown: Select from a list using radio buttons (Demo)
    • Radio: Select from a list using radio buttons (Demo)
    • Checkbox: Select one or many options from a list (Demo)
    • Paragraph: Add additional text to the product (Demo)
    • Divider: Separate the extra product fields in sections (Demo)
    • Name: Separate the extra product fields in sections (Demo)
    • Email: Separate the extra product fields in sections (Demo)
    • Image: Add images to your form, these images can be changed with conditions (Demo)
    • Address: Separate the extra product fields in sections (Demo)
    • Total: Display a total (sum of all fields) (Demo)
    • Single Label: Display a field with a fixed label and value (Demo)
  • Do advanced calculations easily: Each field has a set of preconfigured calculations, or you can create your own using the formula builder
  • Show/Hide conditions: Show or hide fields based on a condition (Demo)
  • Customizable confirmation message: Customize the alert message (Demo)
  • Responsive: The forms look great in desktop or mobile devices
  • Restrictions: Apply various restrictions like the number of times a value is submitted or the number of times a person can submit a form.

Premium Features

  • There is also a premium version that has more fields
    • Button Selection: Select from a list of buttons (Demo)
    • Color Picker: Select a color (Demo)
    • Color Swatcher: Show a list of colors (Demo)
    • Date Range: Define an start and end date (Demo)
    • File Upload: Upload Files (Demo)
    • Google Maps: Let user select an address using google maps (Demo)
    • **Group Panel*: Group fields in a field and show a subtotal (Demo)
    • Image Picker: Select from a list of images (Demo)
    • List: Let the user create a list of items (Demo)
    • Mask: An input box that only allow an specific format useful for credit card or phone fields (Demo)
    • Repeater: Create a dynamic group of items that the form cam repeat (Demo)
    • Signature: Accept signatures in your form (Demo)
    • Slider: Add an slider with customized values (Demo)
    • Switch: A customizable switch field (Demo)
    • Term of service: A checkbox with a customizable action (Demo)
    • Textual Image: An image with customizable text (Demo)
    • Survey: A survey table (Demo)
    • Foat Container: A floating panel that is always visible as you scroll the page (Demo)
  • Multiple Steps Forms: Split your form in sections to make it easy to fill (Demo)
  • Tooltips and descriptions: Add tooltips or a descriptive text to each field (Demo)
  • Custom Validations: Show or hide fields based on a condition (Demo)
  • Secure Front End View/Edition: After the form is submitted you can create a secure link that will let your customer view or edit the entry ([Demo] https://easycalculationforms.rednao.com/field-demo-2/front-end-edition/)
  • Paypal and Stripe Support: Let your customers pay directly after submitting a form
  • Workflows: Send the form to different stages, for example, send the form to an approval team when is initially submitted and then back to the user when it is approved.

short_description: The best form builder when you want to calculate something.

screenshots.caption: Each field can display a subtotal or you can display the total at the end
